# SFAcousticFeature

**Class**

The value of a voice analysis metric.

## Declaration

```swift
class SFAcousticFeature
```

## Inspecting a feature

- **frameDuration**: The duration of the audio frame.
- **acousticFeatureValuePerFrame**: An array of feature values, one value per audio frame, corresponding to a transcript segment of recorded audio.

## Voice analytics

- **SFVoiceAnalytics**: A collection of vocal analysis metrics.

## Inherits From

- NSObject

## Conforms To

- CVarArg
- CustomDebugStringConvertible
- CustomStringConvertible
- Equatable
- Hashable
- NSCoding
- NSCopying
- NSObjectProtocol
- NSSecureCoding
